				<script type="text/javascript">
		  window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};

		  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
		  const isGA4DebugMode = urlParams.has('debug');

		  const targetKeys = [
			'zephr_tracking_id',
			'ga_aut_id',
			'aqfer_puu',
		  ];

		  const intervalTime = 250;
		  const maxWaitTime = 2000;

		  function checkForRequiredDim() {
			const foundKey = targetKeys.find(key => window.ga4Dims.hasOwnProperty(key) && window.ga4Dims[key] !== null);

			if (foundKey !== undefined) {
			  gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
			  clearInterval(intervalId);

			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`At least one key found with a non-null value: ${foundKey}. Sending the page_view.`);
			  }
			} else {
			  const elapsedTime = Date.now() - startTime;
			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`None of the keys found with a non-null value. Elapsed time: ${elapsedTime} ms`);
			  }

			  if (elapsedTime >= maxWaitTime) {
				gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
				clearInterval(intervalId);
				if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				  console.log(`Maximum wait time exceeded. Stopping the search and send the page_view.`);
				}
			  }
			}
		  }

		  const startTime = Date.now();
		  const intervalId = setInterval(checkForRequiredDim, intervalTime);

		</script>

					});

		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
			(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
			(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
			m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
			})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

			(function() {

				// Set the default options for the Google Analytics "create" function.
				var gaCreateOptions = {
					trackingId: "UA-3922003-6",
					cookieDomain: 'auto',
					useAmpClientId: true
				};

				// Add the allowLinker option if it is configured and found in PHP.
									gaCreateOptions.allowLinker = true;
					
				var isLsAvailable = function() {
					var test = 'test';
					try {
						window.localStorage.setItem(test, test);
						window.localStorage.removeItem(test);
						return true;
					} catch (e) {
						return false;
					}
				}

				// Bail early and use the old method if we do not have localStorage in this browser.
				if ( ! isLsAvailable() ) {
					ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );
					return;
				}

				// If we have a GA clientId in the URL.
				var haveClientIdInURL = false;

				// First, check for linker param in URL and let GA use that for our clientId if it exists.
				// Check if URLSearchParams is available, otherwise use a polyfill function.
				if ( 'function' === typeof URLSearchParams ) {
					var urlParams = new URLSearchParams( window.location.search );
					if ( urlParams.get( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				} else {
					/**
					 * A polyfill for older browsers like IE.
					 * @link https://caniuse.com/#feat=urlsearchparams
					 * @link https://davidwalsh.name/query-string-javascript
					 */
					var getUrlParameter = function(name) {
						name = name.replace( /[\[]/, '\\[' ).replace( /[\]]/, '\\]' );
						var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
						var results = regex.exec( location.search );
						return results === null ? false : decodeURIComponent( results[1].replace( /\+/g, ' ' ) );
					};
					if ( getUrlParameter( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				}

				// Assume the GA Cookie is not present.
				var hasGACookie = false;

				// Try to get the GA Cookie.
				var GACookie = document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item) {
					return item.trim().indexOf('_ga=') === 0
				} );

				// Check if we have a cookie.
				if ( GACookie.length ) {
					// If the cookie value is not empty we have a GA cookie.
					hasGACookie = GACookie[0].trim().length > 4 ? true : false;
				}

				// Id to use for localStorage object which holds the GA clientId and expire time.
				var gaClientIdLocalStorageId = 'nyp_ga_client_id';

				// If we don't have a clientId in the URL and there is no GA cookie set, we look in localStorage for one.
				if ( ! haveClientIdInURL && ! hasGACookie ) {

					// If no linker param and no GA cookie, we check in localStorage for the GA clientId.
					var nypGALocalStorage = window.localStorage.getItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId ) || '{}';
					var parsedNYPGALocalStorage = JSON.parse( nypGALocalStorage );
					var now = new Date().getTime();
					if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {
						if ( now <= parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {

							// If we have the clientId, add it to the GA Tracker options.
							if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && '' !== parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId ) {
								gaCreateOptions.clientId = parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId;
							}
						}
					}
				}

				// Create the tracker instance.
				ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );

				// Add the clientId to localStorage using readyCallback to ensure the tracker instance has been instantiated.
				ga( function( tracker ) {
					var clientId = tracker.get( 'clientId' );
					if ( clientId ) {
						var gaClientIdStore = JSON.stringify({
							clientId: clientId,
							expires: new Date().getTime() + 1000*60*60*24*365*2
						});
						window.localStorage.setItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId, gaClientIdStore );
					}

					// Set the client ID as a dimension for tracking against with Aqfer.
					ga( 'set', 'dimension88', clientId );
					window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
					window.ga4Dims.aqfer_puu = clientId;
				});

				if ('function' === typeof CustomEvent) {
					window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('ga:loaded'));
				}
			})();

			ga('require', 'linker');
ga('linker:autoLink', ["nypost.com","pagesix.com","decider.com"])

			// Optimizely Universal Analytics Integration code
			window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push(['activateUniversalAnalytics']);
		</script>

	<div class="site-header__wrapper">
		<div class="site-header__container">
			<div class="site-header__left">
				
<button class="menu-toggle" aria-controls="menu-main-menu" aria-expanded="false">
	<span class="screen-reader-text">Primary Menu</span>

1.665.15 2.88.45 3.646.3.766.88 1.148 1.747 1.148.266 0 .574-.033.923-.102.35-.065.74-.166 1.173-.3v-.05zm15.428-1.198V22.792c0-4.294 1.23-7.13 3.695-8.513 2.463-1.382 5.958-2.073 10.486-2.073 3.562 0 6.75.624 9.562 1.872s4.22 3.637 4.22 7.164v9.787h-16.128v3.147c0 1.166.208 1.997.624 2.497.417.5.876.767 1.374.8h.149c.432-.033.84-.24 0-1.6.375-1.897 1.124s-.45 1.822-.45 3.22v-.05z" /></svg>
				</a>
			</div>

			<div class="site-header__right">
				<div class="nav-header--tips">
	<a class="button button--login button--tips" href="/tips/">
		Tips	</a>

	<h1 class="headline headline--single-fallback">
		35 &#8216;Real Housewives&#8217;-inspired gifts for Bravo fans	</h1>

<p>Want your loved ones to say &#8220;bravo&#8221; to your gifting skills this year?</p>



<p>While you can’t make new &#8220;Real Housewives&#8221; episodes drop sooner, there are plenty of ways to fuel a reality TV-lover&#8217;s fandom without behind-the-scenes secrets or a Bravoleb-sized budget.</p>



<p>From sunny Beverly Hills to snowy Salt Lake City, the TV franchise is filled with a plethora of personalities, “Housewife”-helmed businesses and instantly recognizable references.</p>



<p>So regardless which show your special someone prefers, we’ve rounded up 35 picks to add a little “Housewives” to their homes.</p>


<div id="connatix-outstream-video"></div>
<p>And while Bravolebs are known for keeping receipts, so to speak, they definitely won&#8217;t need the gift receipts for these.</p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center"><a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547100&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=p6-GG--bravo-fan-gifts&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fliteriecandle.com%2Fproducts%2Fflipping-tables" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Literie Flipping Tables Candle</a></h2>

<p>Flip-flopping on what to get? Shop a scent inspired by Teresa Giudice&#8217;s iconic “RHONJ” table-toppling scene. (Just don’t flip any furniture while this cedar- and suede-scented candle is lit.)</p>



<p>It’s part of <a href="https://pagesix.com/2022/10/13/bravo-launches-real-housewives-candle-collection/">Literie’s candle collaboration with Bravo</a>, which features five themed votives ranging from <a href="https://literiecandle.com/products/go-to-sleep" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Go to Sleep!</a> ($45) to <a href="https://literiecandle.com/products/september-spring-summer" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">September, Spring, Summer</a> ($45).</p>

<p>For the giftee who’s already brainstormed their own “Housewives” tagline, pick up this themed tumbler — a dead ringer for the Stanley cups <a href="https://pagesix.com/style/shop-celebrity-tiktok-loved-stanley-tumbler/">currently going viral on TikTok</a>.</p>

<p>When it comes to cozy clothing, we’re <em><a href="https://screenrant.com/real-housewives-salt-lake-city-meredith-marks-catchphrase/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">engaging</a></em>. And for the “Real Housewives of Salt Lake City” fan on your list, this Meredith Marks-inspired hoodie — featuring a quote from her now-famous Palm Springs dinner scene — just might meet the mark.&nbsp;</p>

<p>How ‘bout them apples? If your recipient loves the &#8220;RHONY” reboot, consider this classic crewneck inspired by the Big Apple-based franchise.&nbsp;</p>

<p>When life gives you lemons &#8230; hang one on your tree with this cute felt design inspired by “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” star Dorit Kemsley’s iconic drink order (a Belvedere and soda with three lemons, juiced and carcass out, of course).</p>

<p>“RHOBH” star Kyle Richards doesn’t keep her lips sealed about <a href="https://pagesix.com/2023/07/25/kyle-richards-beauty-must-haves-lip-gloss-to-miracle-mascara/">her favorite products</a> — including this gloss she sported for a memorable scene.</p>



<p>“I will forget things I did yesterday, but I can tell you that I wore this lip gloss … Season 4 at Carlton’s house when Brandi [Glanville] was bringing up the tabloids,” she <a href="https://www.amazon.com/live/channel/49385ab9-4fd2-48c7-b4cc-6115c22f123c?tag=pagesix-20&asc_refurl=https://pagesix.com/article/best-bravo-real-housewives-inspired-gifts/&asc_source=web" rel="nofollow">said in an Amazon livestream</a> this year, adding that the product is “so amazing even though that day was horrible.”</p>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center"><a href="https://www.amazon.com/Who-Gon-Check-Wine-Glass/dp/B08SF8FFKS?tag=pagesix-20&asc_refurl=https://pagesix.com/article/best-bravo-real-housewives-inspired-gifts/&asc_source=web" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Who Gon&#8217; Check Me, Boo? Wine Glass</a></h2>

<p>While watching stars spill the<em> </em>tea onscreen, sip your beverage of choice in a “Housewives”-themed mug. Make it nice with a &#8220;RHONY”-inspired design emblazoned with Dorinda Medley’s iconic quote, or opt for the <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Need-Own-Bravo-Show-White/dp/B07ND4V7H1?tag=pagesix-20&asc_refurl=https://pagesix.com/article/best-bravo-real-housewives-inspired-gifts/&asc_source=web" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">I Need My Own Bravo Show Mug</a> ($19) if you&#8217;d prefer to be the star of the show.</p>

<p>Shopping for someone who&#8217;s keeping close tabs on Scandoval — and wants to subtly support #TeamAriana? After Raquel Leviss <a href="https://pagesix.com/2023/03/31/bag-brand-beis-shades-raquel-leviss-amid-scandoval/">was spotted carrying this bag</a>, the Shay Mitchell-founded brand <a href="https://pagesix.com/2023/04/04/beis-gifts-ariana-madix-bags-after-shading-raquel-leviss/">gifted Ariana Madix</a> its “whole collection.” Do the same for someone special this year, with options ranging from this roomy tote to rolling luggage like the <a href="https://bistravel.pxf.io/c/2229206/1148735/14511?subId1=p6-GG--bravo-fan-gifts&amp;u=https%3A%2F%2Fbeistravel.com%2Fproducts%2Fthe-carry-on-roller-in-beige" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Carry On Roller</a> ($218).</p>

<p>Kathy Hilton keeps her skin hydrated with this celeb-loved face mist, which she once pulled out of her purse and spritzed on in a scene with Kyle Richards on &#8220;RHOBH.&#8221;</p>

<p>Looking for a &#8220;Housewives&#8221; gift for the home? &#8220;RHOP&#8221; star Karen Huger&#8217;s fragrance line includes this present-ready set. If you have a slightly higher budget, opt for <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547100&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=p6-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomingdales.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fladame-by-karen-huger-aroma-luxury-gift-set%3FID%3D4180004%26CategoryID%3D2921" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">LD by KH&#8217;s Aroma Luxury Gift Set</a> ($55) in honor of the Grand Dame.</p>

<p>Looking for new beauty goodies to fill the canvas case? “Real Housewives of Potomac” star Candiace Dillard <a href="https://pagesix.com/2023/10/20/rhop-star-candiace-dillards-high-low-essentials-6-inch-jimmy-choos-and-a-6-tank-top/">recently told Page Six Style</a> she swears by this mattifying, waterproof setting spray.</p>



<p>“Patrick Starrr’s setting spray is crazy amazing,” she raved. “It’s Beyoncé’s favorite, so you know it’s good.”</p>

<hr class="wp-block-separator has-alpha-channel-opacity" />



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center"><a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547100&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=p6-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fs%2Fla-mer-the-mist-facial-spray%2F3563759" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">La Mer The Mist</a></h2>

<p>Looking for a fancy-pants gift? Splurge on luxury skincare from La Mer&nbsp;— a favorite for “Real Housewives of Orange County” star Heather Dubrow, <a href="https://pagesix.com/list/the-best-skincare-products-according-to-celebrities/">along with a slew of other stars</a>.</p>



<p>“This spray is refreshing and hydrating. Makes me feel like I’m a vegetable in the produce section getting misted for freshness!,” she once <a href="https://pagesix.com/2020/05/25/heather-dubrow-is-obsessed-with-this-ridiculous-impractical-accessory/">told Page Six Style</a>.</p>

<p>Long before joining the “RHONY” reboot crew, Jenna Lyons served as executive creative director and president of J.Crew for almost a decade. Gift the fashion-loving fan in your life this limited-edition coffee table book chronicling the classic label’s history.</p>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center"><a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547100&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=p6-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nbcstore.com%2Fproducts%2Fthe-real-housewives-of-beverly-hills-it-keeps-things-hot-and-cold-12oz-wine-tumbler" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">It Keeps Things Hot and Cold Tumbler</a></h2>



<figure class="wp-block-image aligncenter size-full"><a href="https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/real-housewives-fan-gifts-13.jpg"><button
	class="button button--modal-trigger"
	aria-label="Open the image in a modal."
	data-modal-image="7295890">

<p>Want your giftee to rave about their present as much as Dorit Kemsley did <a href="https://people.com/tv/jamie-lee-curtis-talks-becoming-meme-forever-rhobh-wind-chime-lunch/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">about Jamie Lee Curtis’ products</a>? If a “chic” wind chime isn’t in your budget, consider picking up this tumbler inspired by the iconic &#8220;RHOBH&#8221; scene instead.</p>

class="wp-element-caption"> <span class="credit">Charlotte Tilbury</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>This Charlotte Tilbury hue might be named for a different reality star, but it’s a “Real Housewives” hit, too,. “RHONJ” star Margaret Josephs dubbed it a must-have in a recent Page Six Style interview, calling it “the best nude lipstick in the world.”</p>

<p>Practically every “Housewives” franchise <a href="https://pagesix.com/2021/09/09/celebrities-cant-get-enough-of-patbos-cutout-dresses/">features PatBo’s crocheted dresses</a>. The designer cutout gowns are a favorite for Ubah Hassan, Brynn Whitfield, Luann de Lesseps and Jackie Goldschneider (to name but a few).</p>

https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=160,107&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 160w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=144,96&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 144w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=140,93&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 140w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=107,71&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 107w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=93,62&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 93w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=84,56&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 84w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=200,133&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 200w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=231,154&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 231w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=322,215&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 322w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=600,400&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 600w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=87,58&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 87w, https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/04/le-creuset.jpg?resize=50,33&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 50w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></a><figcaption class="wp-element-caption"> <span class="credit">Le Creuset/Amazon</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>Lisa Vanderpump <a href="https://pagesix.com/2018/12/03/dont-dare-buy-lisa-vanderpump-granny-panties-for-christmas/">once told Page Six Style</a> she was hoping to unwrap a set from Le Creuset, which she dubbed “the Rolls-Royce of cookware.”</p>

			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
			dataLayer.push({'scrollTrackingEnabled':1} );

				<script type="text/javascript">
			var dimension21 = 'yes';
		</script>
				<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
		  window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
		  if ( typeof nypost_screen !== 'undefined' ) {
				ga('set', 'dimension8', nypost_screen);
				window.ga4Dims.screen = nypost_screen;
		  }
			ga('set', 'dimension3', 'bravo,celebrity gift guides,gifts,holiday gifts,real housewives,/shopping');
ga('set', 'dimension2', 'Hannah Southwick');
ga('set', 'dimension1', 'article');
ga('set', 'dimension5', 'standard');
ga('set', 'dimension6', '35 \'Real Housewives\'-inspired gifts for Bravo fans');
ga('set', 'dimension7', '');
ga('set', 'dimension12', '9 \'Real Housewives\' gift ideas for the Bravo fan in your life');
ga('set', 'dimension9', '2023-04-18');
ga('set', 'dimension10', '14: 06');
ga('set', 'dimension11', '6575030');
ga('set', 'dimension4', 'style');
ga('set', 'dimension89', 'shopping');
ga('set', 'dimension15', 'bravo');
ga('set', 'dimension16', '1432');
ga('set', 'dimension17', 'no');
ga('set', 'dimension40', 'no');
ga('set', 'dimension44', 'no');
ga('set', 'dimension76', 'In-line');
			ga('set', 'dimension21', dimension21);
			window.ga4Dims.ad_blocker = dimension21;

		  // News Connect Global Identifier
			var ncgGetCookie = function( name ) {
				var regexp = new RegExp( '(?:^' + name + '|;*' + name + ')=(.*?)(?:;|$)', 'g' ),
					result = regexp.exec( document.cookie );

				return ( null === result ) ? null : result[1];
			}

			var ncgId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_id_' );
			if ( null !== ncgId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension32', ncgId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_id = ncgId;
			}

			var ncgSpId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_sp_id\.[^=]*' );
			if ( null !== ncgSpId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension51', ncgSpId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_sp_id = ncgSpId;
			}

			var gaAutId = ncgGetCookie( '_autid' );
			if ( null !== gaAutId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension82', gaAutId );
				window.ga4Dims.ga_aut_id = gaAutId;
			}

			// Get Amazon links.
			var hasAmazon = "false";
			var links = document.links;
			var amazonLinks = [];
			for (var i = 0; links.length > i; i++) {
				if (
					links[i].href.indexOf('amazon.com') > 0
					&& !links[i].classList.contains('buy-button')
				) {
					var gaEventData = '';
					var amazonGaEvent = JSON.stringify({
						category: 'affiliate ecommerce click',
						action: 'amazon',
						label: links[i].href
					});
					  var amazonGa4Event = JSON.stringify({
						event_name: 'ux_engagement',
						source_unit: 'amazon',
						source_position: i + 1
					});

					if (links[i].dataset.gaEvent) {
						var currentGaEvent = links[i].dataset.gaEvent;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGaEvent)) {
							currentGaEvent.push(amazonGaEvent);
							gaEventData = currentGaEvent;
						} else {
							gaEventData = '['+currentGaEvent+','+amazonGaEvent+']';
						}
					} else {
						gaEventData = amazonGaEvent;
					}
				  if (links[i].dataset.ga4Event) {
						var currentGa4Event = links[i].dataset.ga4Event;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGa4Event)) {
							currentGa4Event.push(amazonGa4Event);
							ga4EventData = currentGa4Event;
						} else {
							ga4EventData = '['+currentGa4Event+','+amazonGa4Event+']';
						}
				  } else {
						ga4EventData = amazonGa4Event;
				  }

											links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga-event',
							gaEventData
						);
						links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga4-event',
							ga4EventData
						);
					
					amazonLinks.push(links[i].href);
					hasAmazon = "amazon";
				}
			}
			ga('set', 'dimension46', hasAmazon);
			window.ga4Dims.contains_commerce_link = hasAmazon;

		  if (amazonLinks.length > 0) {
				ga('set', 'dimension47', amazonLinks.join());
				window.ga4Dims.commerce_links = amazonLinks.join();
			}
			ga('require', 'linkid', 'linkid.js');
			ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
			ga('set', "contentGroup1", "article");
ga('set', "contentGroup2", "style");
ga('set', "contentGroup3", "pagesix.com");

							ga('send', 'pageview');
					</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "6575030",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>
					<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
		<noscript><iframe src="//www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-TWX9Z9"
		height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
		<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
		new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
		j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
		'//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;j.addEventListener('load', function() {
		d.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('gtm_loaded', { bubbles: true }));});f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
		})(window,document,'script','dataLayer',"GTM-TWX9Z9");

		window.nypGoogletag = function(callback) {
			if ('object' === typeof window.googletag) {
				window.googletag.cmd.push(callback);
			} else {
				window.addEventListener('gtm_loaded', function() {
					window.googletag.cmd.push(callback);
				});
			}
		};
		</script>

		if (e) return;
		e = d.createElement(s); e.id = i; e.async = true;

0:t.target,null==t?void 0:t.contentRect)}))}));t.forEach((t=>{n.observe(t),o.observe(t)})),requestAnimationFrame((()=>{requestAnimationFrame((()=>{t[0].style.setProperty("content-visibility","auto")}))}))}(document.querySelectorAll(".widget"))}();</script><style id='core-block-supports-inline-css' type='text/css'>
.wp-container-30.wp-container-30,.wp-container-33.wp-container-33,.wp-container-36.wp-container-36,.wp-container-39.wp-container-39{flex-wrap:nowrap;}
</style>

<script type='text/javascript' src='https://pagesix.com/wp-content/mu-plugins/jetpack-13.0/_inc/build/sharedaddy/sharing.min.js?ver=13.0' id='sharing-js-js'></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var windowOpen;
	document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		const shareLinks = document.querySelectorAll('li.share-facebook a');
		shareLinks.forEach(function(shareLink) {
			// Exclude email from opening in modal window.
			if ( shareLink.href.indexOf('mailto') !== -1 ) {
				return;
			}

			shareLink.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				if ( 'undefined' !== typeof windowOpen ){ // If there's another sharing window open, close it.
					windowOpen.close();
				}
				windowOpen = window.open( shareLink.href, 'wpcomfacebook', 'menubar=1,resizable=1,width=600,height=400' );
			});
		});
	});
</script>

				windowOpen = window.open( shareLink.href, 'wpcomtwitter', 'menubar=1,resizable=1,width=600,height=350' );
			});
		});
	});
</script>

			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.slideshow-ad-wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-custom")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-custom");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-custom not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
